attributes.action: Provide funding to cover frequent nightly security patrols on UK canals, lakes and rivers to protect and prevent decimation of our wildlife
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There have been more and more cases of eastern europeans illegally fishing our canals for carp and other specimens of fish at night, not by catch and release but to eat them.  This includes swans and ducks.  These people do not have licences,do not use the proper fishing tackle and equipment and are destroying our wildlife in large numbers.  There needs to be tougher legislation in place to stop this activity, not just signs, deportation or arrest.  Please support and put an end to this barbaric activity taking place.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Provide funding to cover frequent nightly security patrols on UK canals, lakes and rivers to protect and prevent decimation of our wildlife."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page22401


Prime Minister's Office
